title: Local-global principle for leaf schemes
abstract:
We study Hodge loci as leaf schemes of foliations. The main ingredient is the
Gauss-Manin connection matrix of families of projective varieties. We also aim
to investigate a conjecture on the ring of definition of leaf schemes and its
consequences such as the algebraicity of leaf schemes (Cattani-Deligne-Kaplan
theorem in the case of Hodge loci). This conjecture is a consequence of a
local-global principle for leaf schemes.
